    Photography & Creative Exploration

    Photography started as a curiosity about image processing and AI-generated visuals‚Äîtechnologies like Stable Diffusion fascinated me.
    However, I soon realized that photography itself is an art beyond the tech side.

    I became particularly drawn to film photography, a medium where every frame carries a distinct texture, grain, and organic imperfection‚Äîqualities that digital AI struggles to replicate. The scarcity of structured data on film-based photography presents an exciting challenge, further fueling my interest in this field.
